project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with customizable length, containing uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement the function to generate a random password
Allow the user to configure the password length
Ensure the password includes uppercase letters
Ensure the password includes lowercase letters
Ensure the password includes special characters
Write tests for the password generation function to ensure functionality
Execute tests on the password generator to verify correct password generation
